scripts.test: cross-env RETRY=3 STREAMS=4 LOG=1 HL=1 npx wdio --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='not @Pending' --spec './features/**/*.feature' --exclude 'features/debug/debug.feature' 2>&1 | tee run.log
scripts.test:ui: cross-env RETRY=2 STREAMS=2 LOG=1 HL=0 npx wdio --spec './features/**/*.feature' --exclude 'features/debug/debug.feature' 2>&1 | tee run.log
scripts.test:docker: cd .. && docker-compose build && cd tests && arch -x86_64 cross-env LOG=1 RETRY=1 HL=1 DOCKER=1 SYNGRISI_DOCKER_PORT=3102 SYNGRISI_DOCKER_DB_PORT=27018 SYNGRISI_DOCKER_IMAGES_PATH=./baselinesTest/100/ SYNGRISI_DB_URI=mongodb://syngrisi-db:27017/SyngrisiDb npx wdio --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='not @exclude_docker and not @Pending' --spec 'features/**/*.feature'
scripts.smoke: arch -x86_64 cross-env STREAMS=4 LOG=1 HL=1 npx wdio --spec 'features/**/*.feature' --cucumberOpts.tagExpression='@smoke'
scripts.testui: arch -x86_64 cross-env LOG=1 HL=0 npx wdio --spec 'features/**/*.feature'
